# node rm

```markdown
Usage:  docker node rm NODE [NODE...]

Remove a node from the swarm

Aliases:
  rm, remove

Options:
      --help   Print usage
```

Removes specified nodes from a swarm.


Example output:

    $ docker node rm swarm-node-02
    Node swarm-node-02 removed from swarm
